definition[0]: a law made by a local government that people in that area must obey
definition[1]: a rule made by an organization to control the people who belong to it
definition[2]: a local government law that must be obeyed by the people living in an area, or people visiting it
example[0]: a bylaw banning public drinking in the town centre
definition[3]: a rule made by a company or organization that must be obeyed by the people working for it
